price: 11. Hadday wax ka mid ahi xaasaskiinna idinka aadaan xagga gaalada, markaas guul heshaan iyo qaniimo, siiya kuway xaasaskoodu tageen (oo gaalada ku biireen) wax u dhigma waxay bixiyeen (oo meher ah6). Kana cabsada Alle ee ah Kan aad rumaysan tihiin.
arabic: وَإِن فَاتَكُمۡ شَيۡءٞ مِّنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡكُفَّارِ فَعَاقَبۡتُمۡ فَـَٔاتُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ذَهَبَتۡ أَزۡوَٰجُهُم مِّثۡلَ مَآ أَنفَقُواْۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنتُم بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنُونَ
category: She that is to be Examined
footnotes: 6. Waxaa loola jeedaa intaan loo qaybinin qaniimada shan meel, waxaa la siin meherkii ay bixiyeen raggaa dumarkooda riddoobeen oo ka aadeen xagga gaalada.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-in fātakum shayon min azwājikum ilā al-kufāri faʿāqabtum faātū alladhīna dhahabat azwājuhum mith'la mā anfaqū wa-ittaqū al-laha alladhī antum bihi mu'minūna
